snippet.title: Tupi: The Legend of Arariboia - ALPHA VERSION  Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Tupi: The Legend of Arariboia is an exciting turn-based roguelite RPG game where players delve into the rich and fascinating story of the indigenous warrior Arariboia. After being driven from his lands by a shadow that plagues the forests, he must find a new refuge for his people. Guided by a mysterious shaman, he is tasked with rebuilding his village and mastering the powers of three forest guardian spirits to defeat the impending devouring darkness.

ADD THE GAME TO YOUR STEAM WISHLIST AND STAY UPDATED WITH ALL THE NEWS!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3028370/Tupi__The_Legend_of_Arariboia/

Special thanks to Giulia Storino for the Caipora's voice.
